title: [Large-scale] Mobile Microlearning Course for Elementary Physics Concept Comprehension

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of middle school-level foundational physics concepts
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment for current elementary teachers to strengthen job competencies. Verifies applicability to actual classes through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Apply Newton's laws of motion and force concepts to real-life scenarios
Surveys can diagnose learners' misconceptions of physics concepts and suggest improvement strategies
5-minute learning modules can be designed and shared using smartphone-based microlearning content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
